name: hacker-box
description: Hacker Box is a web application that I'm building as an exercise to learn React.js and other web technologies. This is a work in progress. Checkout the site [here](https://hackerbox.herokuapp.com/)!

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
